**符文剑**（runesword）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它使用[阔剑](/wiki/%E9%98%94%E5%89%91 "阔剑")技能。未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时，它的外观为**[符文阔剑](/wiki/%E7%AC%A6%E6%96%87%E9%98%94%E5%89%91 "符文阔剑")**（runed broadsword），与[精灵阔剑](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E9%98%94%E5%89%91 "精灵阔剑")的外观相同。符文剑由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成。

[兴风者](/index.php?title=%E5%85%B4%E9%A3%8E%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兴风者 (page does not exist)")是一种[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类符文剑。

## 生成

符文剑不会在游戏中随机生成，它仅作为兴风者的[基础物品](/index.php?title=%E5%9F%BA%E7%A1%80%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "基础物品 (page does not exist)")。如果兴风者已经在某局游戏中生成，那么当游戏加载有兴风者的[骨档](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%A8%E6%A1%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骨档 (page does not exist)")时，骨档中的兴风者就会被替换为普通的符文剑。玩家也可以通过[许愿](/index.php?title=%E8%AE%B8%E6%84%BF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "许愿 (page does not exist)")获取符文剑。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit 20cbadc](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/20cbadcf85544cf9d0c3f4e4200b2800bab49c8e)，[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")的[任务领袖](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E9%A2%86%E8%A2%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "任务领袖 (page does not exist)")[珀利阿斯](/index.php?title=%E7%8F%80%E5%88%A9%E9%98%BF%E6%96%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "珀利阿斯 (page does not exist)")生成时会携带一把+5符文剑。

## 策略

符文剑比精灵阔剑更轻，价格也更高，但对小型怪物的伤害比精灵阔剑低。

## 历史

符文剑最初于[NetHack 3.1.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.0 "NetHack 3.1.0")加入游戏，同时，兴风者的基础物品从阔剑改为符文剑。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Runesword/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants will generate a runesword on specific levels, with the standard 1⁄5 chance of it being made into an artifact (i.e., typically Stormbringer).

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), a runesword is always generated in a hidden room within the Boulder Path of the [Lawful Quest](/wiki/Lawful_Quest "Lawful Quest").

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), runeswords deal 1d10+1d4 damage versus small monsters and 1d10+1 versus large monsters.

A cursed +3 runesword is generated in one of the Ruined Temple chests within the [Chaos Temple Quest](/wiki/Chaos_Temple_Quest "Chaos Temple Quest") at level creation.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [Pelias](/wiki/Pelias "Pelias") is always generated with a +5 runesword, and [Saint Michael](/index.php?title=Saint_Michael\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Saint Michael (page does not exist)") is always generated with a runesword.

A runesword can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a broadsword and a [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger"). [Dichotomy](/wiki/Dichotomy "Dichotomy") is an artifact runesword that can only be created by combining [Fire Brand](/wiki/Fire_Brand "Fire Brand") and [Frost Brand](/wiki/Frost_Brand "Frost Brand") at a forge.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, there is a 3⁄20 chance of a cursed -9 runesword named Excalipoor generating in a chest within the thieves' stronghold in the village of the [Town](/wiki/Town "Town") branch. Excalipoor is a recurring weapon in the *[Final Fantasy](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Final_Fantasy "wikipedia:Final Fantasy")* series of games, where it is a very weak knockoff of [Excalibur](/wiki/Excalibur "Excalibur") known to fool treasure hunters.

## 引用及注释
